SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
This class represents all possible actions during a Game.
Bag
The class represents the bag of Piece linked to a Board during a Game.
BelegSpectrangle
This class is the main class that run the game with GUI.
Board
This class represents the board of the Spectrangle game.
BoardPanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
Constants
This class contains global colors information of the original Spectrangle game
Game
The class implements the behavior of the Spectrangle game (a modified two players version with skip and penalities)
GameAdapter
An abstract adapter class for receiving game events.
GameEvent
This event is used to notify interested parties that the game state is changed during a Game.
GameListener
The listener interface for receiving "interesting" game events (begin, and end) during a game.
HMIStrategy
This class is a special a Strategy class that is recognized by the GUI.
LogPanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
MisdesignAdapter
An abstract adapter class for receiving misdesign events.
MisdesignEvent
This event is used to notify interested parties that an error of design, conception or implementation has occurred during a Game.
MisdesignListener
The listener interface for receiving "interesting" misdesign events (begin, and end) during a game.
Piece
This class defines all existing Spectrangle pieces, there are triangle shape with three colors and one value.
PiecesPanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
Player
This class represents a Spectrangle player that use a Strategy and owns some Pieces.
RandomStrategy
This Strategy represents a strategy that randomly plays.
RoundAdapter
An abstract adapter class for receiving round events.
RoundEvent
This event is used to notify interested parties that the turn state is changed during a Game.
RoundListener
The listener interface for receiving "interesting" round events (begin, and end) during a game.
ScorePanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
SettingsPanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
SkipStrategy
This Strategy represents a strategy that always skip (i.e.
SpectrangleFrame
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
SpectranglePanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
Strategy
This interface represents a generic strategy behavior (i.e.
StrategyAdapter
An abstract adapter class for registering events.
TimePanel
This class is a GUI component of the Game.
TriangleCellDrawer
This class is an utility class for GUI component of the Game.
TurnAdapter
An abstract adapter class for receiving turn events.
TurnEvent
This event is used to notify interested parties that the turn state is changed during a Game.
TurnListener
The listener interface for receiving "interesting" turn events (begin, and end) during a game.
